insights.finding: GoHighLevel offers 0 different triggers across 0 types

insights.details: This indicates the typical complexity level of automations in the system

recommendations.suggestion: Implement webhook triggers for real-time external system integration
recommendations.reasoning: Webhook triggers enable instant responses to external events

recommendations.suggestion: Add conditional logic actions (if/then/else) for complex workflows
recommendations.reasoning: Conditional logic greatly increases automation flexibility

recommendations.suggestion: Implement workflow templates for common automation patterns
recommendations.reasoning: Templates reduce setup time and ensure best practices

recommendations.suggestion: Add native integrations with popular fitness/gym management tools
recommendations.reasoning: Direct integrations reduce friction and increase adoption
